segments.text: The whole kitchen buzzes with a sense of activity, yet there’s an underlying tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the water hasn't caught the woman’s attention by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how they say the mundane can hide chaos beneath it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I grasp the gravity of the moment; it could all collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are completely in their world, and it adds beauty to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that beauty is precarious, like a delicate balance on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself holding my breath, hoping everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
